SEARCH
Package edu.kit.unwwi.checkpoints

Klasse Checkpoint

java.lang.Object
edu.kit.unwwi.checkpoints.Checkpoint
public class Checkpoint extends Object
A class representing a checkpoint of a running QEMU-instance.

  • Methodendetails

    • createCheckpoint

      public static Checkpoint createCheckpoint(@NotNull @NotNull Path location, @NotNull @NotNull QMPInterface qmpInterface) throws IOException, InterruptedException, ExecutionException
      Create a new checkpoint at the given location containing all data that could be queried on the given interface.
      Parameter:
      location - Where to store the data to.
      qmpInterface - The interface connected to QEMU to query.
      Gibt zurück:
      A checkpoint object representing all the data found.
      Löst aus:
      IOException - An IO-error occurred while writing to disk or while communicating with QEMU.
      InterruptedException - A thread was interrupted while waiting for data from QEMU.
      ExecutionException - An exception occurred while waiting for data from QEMU.

    • getContainingPath

      @NotNull public @NotNull Path getContainingPath()
      Returns the directory containing all data from this checkpoint.
      Gibt zurück:
      Where this checkpoint is stored.

    • getJsonFile

      @NotNull public @NotNull Path getJsonFile()
      The path of the JSON-File containing all the data equivalent to getJson().
      Gibt zurück:
      The path of the JSON-file of this checkpoint.

    • getTimestamp

      public long getTimestamp()
      The timestamp from QEMU of when this checkpoint was created.
      Gibt zurück:
      When this checkpoint was created.

    • getJson

      @NotNull public @NotNull org.json.JSONObject getJson()
      All data included in this checkpoint as JSON.
      Gibt zurück:
      All data included in this checkpoint as JSON.

    • createFollowUp

      public Checkpoint createFollowUp(@NotNull @NotNull QMPInterface qmpInterface) throws IOException, InterruptedException, ExecutionException
      Create a new Checkpoint that is a successor to this checkpoint. It checks whether memory regions or blockdevices are still identical to preserve space, however for this it only tracks the full file, so if a single bit changes, the complete file gets saved again.
      Parameter:
      qmpInterface - The interface to query the current VM on.
      Gibt zurück:
      The newly created checkpoint.
      Löst aus:
      IOException - When something went wrong during IO or while communicating with QEMU.
      InterruptedException - If this thread got interrupted for some reason.
      ExecutionException - When an exception occurred in another thread affecting this thread.
